fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Incite a communist rebellion in the town during the night. 1 Use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Starts with private chats with all "head" evil faction roles. If an evil faction has no head, it will be a random member instead.
- Inciting a communist rebellion requires approval of all "head" evil faction roles you are in a chat with, the day after. If they reject the proposition, it does not take up a use.
- The night after a communist rebellion is approved, all "Good" faction players will be equally split between "Mensheviks" and "Bolsheviks". "Power" roles of "Good" factions will always be assigned as "Mensheviks".
- "Mensheviks" must, along with their original goal, eliminate all "Bolsheviks" to win the game, and vice versa.
- For all intents & purposes of flavor text, the game takes place in Russia. Good luck.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town/Good Factions lose the game.
